bibl.title: The Landscape of Life: Allegory and Allusion in an Alexandrian Painted Tomb. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: The tomb was found in 1960 in the quarter of Wardian in an area once part of the Western cemetery of ancient Alexandria. The themes depicted in the tomb (2nd century B.C.) and their significance.

bibl.title: Alexandrian Studies in memoriam Daoud Abdu Daoud

bibl.seg: VENIT Marjorie Susan, The Landscape of Life: Allegory and Allusion in an Alexandrian Painted Tomb. Avec résumé en anglais.
Alexandrian Studies in memoriam Daoud Abdu Daoud = BSAA 45 (1993) pp. 383-390, pll. XCVI-XCVII.
The tomb was found in 1960 in the quarter of Wardian in an area once part of the Western cemetery of ancient Alexandria. The themes depicted in the tomb (2nd century B.C.) and their significance.
